Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
fissionable \fis"sion*able\, a. Capable of undergoing {nuclear fission}; -- a property of certain isotopes of elements with heavy nuclei.
Syn: fissile. [PJC]
fissionable adj : capable of undergoing nuclear fission; "a fissionable nucleous"; "fissionable material" [syn: {fissile}] [ant: {nonfissionable}]
